li.displayName: HSK Fences and Floors: Vile's Patch

ModMetaData.description:
Adds lots of floors and hand-drawn walls, doors, and more. Requires Vile's Wood You Please mod, which integrates different wood types from tree species. For instance, oak hardwood floors are different than pine hardwood floors.
Update 4.1 (Biomes FTGU support) - 1/17/2021 Natural terrain textures are removed and are now part of Biomes: From The Ground Up, which overhauls and retextures biomes.
